name: ext-sockets-c
description: Sockets + TLS FFI backend for std.net (run-os only).
docs:
Sockets + TLS FFI backend for std.net (run-os only).

Modules:
- ext.sockets._ffi
- ext.sockets.net

FFI libs:
- ssl
- crypto

Usage:
- Add dependency: x07 pkg add ext-sockets-c@0.1.6
- Import the modules listed above.
